posts.post_title: FS Lajoie and HOF tough backs
posts.post_content:
T206 SGC 1.5 Lajoie throwing. Great looking 1.5.
$no longer available 

T206 SGC Baker Peidmont 350/460 Fac 42 very tough combo
$SOLD

T206 SGC1 Chief Bender Cycle 460, rough but very tough card.
$SOLD

Prices are net to me and include free shipping.
Changed collecting focus recently so moving some cards to fund other stuff.

Offers always consider.

PM with interest or questions.[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20211129/a502401604c417651eec6dc47fb1bad5.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20211129/e8f7ccd2e7b30b75d68942d9cf82f6f4.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20211129/d6f1e9c0d3afe8857cdcf7c608da8012.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20211129/dcff28a6398b7d61161f5c3cbe4ce872.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20211129/d06e8388a9b1608cac9ff638383f9691.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20211129/4cac5853c2e4b7bca78d60d34d8b551f.jpg[/IMG]
